Header: Identification parade for Matara suspects on 16th July
Content: The Matara Magistrateâ€™s Court has ordered to present all suspects with respect to the exchange of fire with the Police in the Matara town, for an identification parade. The suspects who had come to burgle the jewellery shop in the Matara town exchanged fire with the Police. The Courts informed that the identification parade will be held on the 16th of this month. One of the suspects in this case was produced in Courts today. The suspect was Athula Kithsiri who was detained in the Angunukolapelessa Prison. The suspect was brought to Court premises under special Police security. Meanwhile, Kosgoda Tharaka, who is one of the main suspects in the incident was not produced in Courts today. The Police said that he was ill.
